title: SHOULD_USE_METRIC_MEASUREMENTS

0xD3D15555431AB7930xBAF17315// ShouldUseMetricMeasurements
BOOL SHOULD_USE_METRIC_MEASUREMENTS();Returns: Returns true if the game is using the metric measurement system, false if imperial is used.Returns true if the game is using the metric measurement system (profile setting 227), false if imperial is used.Old name:  _IS_GAME_USING_METRIC_MEASUREMENT_SYSTEMExamples:Luaif (ShouldUseMetricMeasurements()) then
    print("Distance to finish line: 8,04672 km.")
else
    print("Distance to finish line: 5 mi.")
end
